name: Pestering Raven
rules: Flying \n \n \tap : Each player discards a card at random.

name: Scheming Jackal
rules: When Scheming Jackal dies, each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

name: Juggling Jester
rules: \mana_w , \tap , Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

name: Confounding Spider
rules: Reach \n Whenever Confounding Spider deals combat damage to a creature, put a web counter on that creature. \n Creatures with web counters on them don't untap as normal.

name: Skulking Octopus
rules: \mana_u , Reveal a card from your hand: Skulking Octopus gains protection from colors of the revealed card until end of turn.
